typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (struct IProposal.Proposal memory[] memory)

createProposal(string,string,uint128).details: can only be called by campaign manager and if WorkflowStatus is Pending

params._title: as proposal title, _description as proposal description and _amount as amount to be unlocked for spending

deleteProposal(uint8).details: can only be called by campaign manager and if WorkflowStatus is Registered

params.proposalId: as proposal index in proposalList array

getResults(uint8).details: can only be called only if proposal deadline is passed

params.proposalId: as proposal index in proposalList array

startVotingSession(uint8).details: can only be called by campaign manager and if WorkflowStatus is Registered

params.proposalId: as proposal index in proposalList array

voteProposal(uint8,bool).details: can only be called by contributors and if WorkflowStatus is VotingSessionStarted

params.proposalId: as proposal index in proposalList array and _vote as 1 for ok and 0 for nok

getProposals(uint8).notice: return list of proposal matching proposalType of param

getResults(uint8).notice: check if proposal is ok or nok

voteProposal(uint8,bool).notice: enable contributors to vote for or against proposal
